text: Excuse me. You must be Alex Russo. I had
no idea you were
so beautiful. You seem really nice, but
I have a boyfriend.
You have the potential to be the most
powerful wizard of your generation.
Winning was just the beginning. Magic is
not forgetting what you want. It's time
to grow up. Until a stranger pushes
Alex. Everybody still wants me to
change. So, you're going to change your
whole personality? Just the parts that
nobody liked. Into casting a splitsecond
spell. You still have all your good
parts. Where did all your bad parts go?
Let me out of here, you ugly hag. Maybe
she's like a bird. She'll be quiet if we
cover her up. Hey.
Okay. Where would a bad Alex go?
Dividing Alex from her family. Guess
what? I've changed. I don't believe her.
Me neither. Her boyfriend. Just as I
thought. Herself. You have to let me go
so I can save the world again. Now the
fate of everything. You won't get away
with this. Already have. You let them go
right now or I'll go what? Don't forget
I have all the bad. Hangs in the balance
as Alex must face herself in the
biggest.
Guess who? Battle. I'm going to take
over the world yet. I'm telling you, you
have the wrong wizard.
Selena Gomez is back in a Disney Channel
special event. What did you do?
The Wizards Return: Alex versus Alex
premieres Friday, March 15th at 8:7
Central.
